body_html:
I'd like to help with this, as I have a few applications that could benefit from better float64 support.
@siddharth-agrawal: Are you okay with splitting the work on this to speed things up? We could use this issue to announce which ops we want to work on, so we don't end up duplicating work.

I've noticed that the reduction ops for float64 are quite slow when executing on the GPU.
I've submitted some changes to Eigen that enable the faster optimized code path:
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/207/enable-efficient-tensor-reduction-for/diff

body:
I'd like to help with this, as I have a few applications that could benefit from better `float64` support.
@siddharth-agrawal: Are you okay with splitting the work on this to speed things up? We could use this issue to announce which ops we want to work on, so we don't end up duplicating work.

I've noticed that the reduction ops for `float64` are quite slow when executing on the GPU.
I've submitted some changes to Eigen that enable the faster optimized code path:
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/207/enable-efficient-tensor-reduction-for/diff
